Name: Payer type
Description/valid values: See lookup table MC001

Name: Product code
Description/valid values: See lookup table MC003

Name: Claim ID
Description/valid values: Payer’s unique claim identifier

Name: Service line counter
Description/valid values: Increments of 1 for each claim line

Name: Member ID
Description/valid values: Plan-specific unique member identifier

Name: Payment date
Description/valid values: CCYYMMDD (example: 20090624). Blanks allowed for denied claims only.

Name: Admission date
Description/valid values: CCYYMMDD (example: 20090603). Required only for institutional claims.

Name: Discharge status
Description/valid values: See lookup table MC023. Required only for institutional claims.

Name: Rendering provider ID
Description/valid values: Identifier for the rendering provider as assigned by the reporting entity

Name: Type of bill
Description/valid values: See lookup table MC 036. Required only for institutional claims.

Name: Place of service
Description/valid values: See lookup table MC 037. Required only for professional claims.

Name: Claim status
Description/valid values: Was claim paid, denied, CCO encounter, or MCO encounter only? Valid values: P (paid), D (denied), C (CCO encounter), E (other managed care encounter)

Name: COB status
Description/valid values: Was claim a COB claim? Valid values: Y (yes), N (no)

Name: Principal diagnosis
Description/valid values: ICD-10 diagnosis code for dates of service beginning 10/01/2014. Include all characters (example: E10.359). ICD-9 diagnosis code for dates of service before 10/01/2015 If ICD-9 include all digits and exclude decimal point (example: 01220)

Name: POA flag 1
Description/valid values: Present on admission flag for principal diagnosis. See look-up table MC041P. Required only for institutional claims.

Name: Diagnosis 2
Description/valid values: ICD-10 diagnosis code for dates of service beginning 10/01/2014. Include all characters (example: E10.359). ICD-9 diagnosis code for dates of service before 10/01/2015. If ICD-9 include all digits and exclude decimal point (example: 01220)

Name: POA flag 2
Description/valid values: Present on admission flag for diagnosis 2. Required if MC042 is populated. See look-up table MC041P. Required only for institutional claims.

Name: Diagnosis 3
Description/valid values: ICD-10 diagnosis code for dates of service beginning 10/01/2014. Include all characters (example: E10.359). ICD-9 diagnosis code for dates of service before 10/01/2015. If ICD-9 include all digits and exclude decimal point (example: 01220)

Description/valid values: Present on admission flag for diagnosis 3. Required if MC043 is populated. See look-up table MC041P. Required only for institutional claims.

Name: Revenue code
Description/valid values: Include all digits (example: 0320). Required only for institutional claims.

Name: CPT/CPT II/HCPCS procedure code
Description/valid values: CPT, CPT II or HCPCS code. Include all digits (examples: 29870 or G0289)

Name: Procedure modifier 1
Description/valid values: CPT or HCPCS modifier. Include all digits (examples: 50 or AA)

Name: Procedure modifier 2
Description/valid values: CPT or HCPCS modifier. Include all digits (examples: 50 or AA)

Name: Procedure modifier 3
Description/valid values: CPT or HCPCS modifier. Include all digits (examples: 50 or AA)

Name: Procedure modifier 4
Description/valid values: CPT or HCPCS modifier. Include all digits (examples: 50 or AA)

Name: Principal inpatient procedure code
Description/valid values: ICD-10 procedure code for dates of service after 10/01/2014. Include all characters, (example: B245ZZ3). ICD-9 procedure code for dates of service before 10/01/2015. If ICD-9 include all digits and exclude decimal point (example: 0085). Required only for institutional claims.

Name: Date of service – From
Description/valid values: CCYYMMDD (example: 20090603)

Name: Date of service – Thru
Description/valid values: CCYYMMDD (example: 20090603)

Name: Quantity
Description/valid values: Count of units sent on claim line.

Name: Charges
Description/valid values: Two explicit decimal places. Enter 0 if amount equals zero. Leave blank if missing. Example: 15102.00

Name: Allowed amount
Description/valid values: Two explicit decimal places. Enter 0 if amount equals zero. Leave blank if missing. Example: 15102.00

Name: Payment
Description/valid values: Two explicit decimal places. Enter 0 if amount equals zero. Leave blank if missing. Example: 15102.00

Name: Prepaid amount
Description/valid values: Two explicit decimal places. Enter 0 if amount equals zero. Leave blank if missing. Example: 15102.00

Name: Co-payment
Description/valid values: Two explicit decimal places. Enter 0 if amount equals zero. Leave blank if missing. Example: 15102.00

Name: Co-insurance
Description/valid values: Two explicit decimal places. Enter 0 if amount equals zero. Leave blank if missing. Example: 15102.00

Name: Deductible
Description/valid values: Two explicit decimal places. Enter 0 if amount equals zero. Leave blank if missing. Example: 15102.00

Name: Patient pay amount
Description/valid values: Required if any of MC065, MC066, or MC067 are missing. Two explicit decimal places. Enter 0 if amount equals zero. Leave blank if missing. Example: 15102.00

Name: Discharge date
Description/valid values: Required only for institutional claims. Use 99991231 if patient has not discharged. CCYYMMDD (example: 20090605). Required only for institutional claims.

Name: Billing provider ID
Description/valid values: Identifier for the billing provider as assigned by the reporting entity

Name: Prior version claim number
Description/valid values: Required for participants in Q-Corp initiative.

Name: Claim received date
Description/valid values: Required for participants in Q-Corp initiative. CCYYMMDD

Name: DRG
Description/valid values: DRG paid by payer. If not available send billed DRG. Required for participants in Q-Corp initiative. Example: 061

Name: DRG type
Description/valid values: Required for participants in Q-Corp initiative. Valid values: C (CMS v.24) or M (MS-DRG)
Do not populate as of 01/01/2017.
Do not populate as of 01/01/2017.
Do not populate as of 01/01/2017.
Do not populate as of 01/01/2017.
Do not populate as of 01/01/2017.

Name: Plan specific contract number
Description/valid values: Plan specific contract number (aka group number)

Name: ICD version code
Description/valid values: Specifies the claim’s ICD version. Valid values: 9 (ICD-9) or 10 (ICD-10)

Name: Network
Description/valid values: See lookup table MC202

Name: Admission Type
Description/valid values: Required for inpatient claims. Populate this field only if claim is inpatient. Valid values: 1 (Emergency), 2 (Urgent), 3 (Elective), 4 (Newborn), 5 (Trauma Center), 9 (Information Not Available)

Name: Admission Source
Description/valid values: Required for inpatient claims. Populate this field only if claim is inpatient. See lookup table MC204

Name: Admitting Diagnosis
Description/valid values: Required for inpatient claims. ICD-10 diagnosis code for dates of service beginning 10/01/2014. Include all characters (example: E10.359). ICD-9 diagnosis code for dates of service before 10/01/2014. If ICD-9 include all digits and exclude decimal point (example: 01220). Populate this field only if claim is inpatient.

Name: Pay to Patient Flag
Description/valid values: Valid values: Y (patient was directly reimbursed), N (patient was not directly reimbursed). If unknown, default to N.

Name: Empty field
Description/valid values: For future implementation

Name: Empty field
Description/valid values: For future implementation

Description/valid values: For future implementation

Name: Empty field
Description/valid values: For future implementation
